question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [lift off and turn left facing left of the bridge and head straight. at the end of the road turn right facing the left of the pop bottle sign and head straight. at the left of the sign turn left facing the road and follow it. veer right to behind the bottle cap sign then veer left to the car wash sign. at the car wash sign turn right facing the yellow sign and head straight. veer right of the sign around the building. at the tall white building climb it to the top and stop at the top.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I take off and turn left, facing left of the bridge, then go straight.  
B. I turn right toward the signs surrounding the building.  
C. At the end of the road, I turn right toward the left of the gas bottle sign, then go straight.  
D. I climb to the top of the white tall building and stop at the top.  
E. I turn left at the building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: The initial frames show the agent on a bridge, and the first instruction is to "lift off and turn left facing left of the bridge and head straight." This matches the visual context where the agent appears to be starting its movement from the bridge.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 5)]
Option: A
Reason: The video starts with the agent on a bridge. The first instruction is to "lift off and turn left facing left of the bridge and head straight." The video shows the agent moving in this manner.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: A; Reason: The initial frames show the agent on a bridge, and the first instruction is to "lift off and turn left facing left of the bridge and head straight." This matches the visual context where the agent appears to be starting its movement from the bridge.
